full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A RA'I ZHABS KYI MDZAD PA'I 'BUM BSANGS BEEd'URYA SNGON PO BKRA SHIS 'DOD PA'I RE BSKONGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

KYIS, DPAL BSAM YAS KYI GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS PA'I TSE, LHA SRIN LDE BRGYAD LA SOGS PA NAG PHYOGS PA RNAMS KYIS 'DUL BA'I CHED DU MDZAD PA, DE'I RJES SU GANGS CAN BOD KYIS NAD RIMS DANG YAMS @032B PAGS NAD DANG RIMS TSAD LA SOGS PA LHAR LTAS PA'I MTSAN MA GYUR BA LA ^ BTZUN PA 'JAM DBYANGS DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS YAR KLUNGS KYI STOBS 'DI DAG ZHI BAR BYED PA'I THABS 'DI MCHOG GO SNYAMS PA'I LHAN THABS SU MDZAD PA'I CHO GA BZHIN DU PHYOGS PHYOGS SU 'BUM BSANGS 'DI BTANG NA BKRA SHIS DGE LTAS MANG DU BYUNG BA LA, MI LA SOGS PA MGRON RNAMS KYI 'BUL PHONGS KYI SDUG BSNGAL SEL BA DANG, PHAN PA PHYOGS 'BYUNG PO RNAMS, ,LHA SRIN SDE BRGYAD 'TSE BA LA, ,SKABS GCIG BLA MA YI DAM LHA, ,DKON MCHOG RIN CHEN RNAM GSUM DES, ,KHYAD PAR MYUR DU BRTZE DON GRUB, ,BSTAN BSRUNG CHOS SKYONGS BSRUNG BA YIN,
